title: Moonlit Harem: Part 1
description: People say you can't escape destiny. But I'm sure as hell going to try.I'm a vampire. A blood-sucking creature of the night who needs to feed on human blood to keep me sustained.The only problem is, I find the whole lifestyle repulsive and refuse to feed on humans. It's been hard, but I've managed so far.But as my 21st birthday nears, it is my time to complete the required ritual to take a human life and join my fellow vampires as a true member of coven.I refuse. And I run.But when my escape leads me into a den of angry werewolves, I find myself with an entirely new set of problems to deal with.Moonlit Harem is a paranormal romance reverse harem serial. Each episode is approximately 15-20k words. All episodes will be released as an omnibus when complete.
author: Nicole Marie
